metadata.title: Series 17, Episode 5 - 'Snooker cue umbrella chin.' | Full Episode

tracks.text: Greg Davies, the Taskmaster, types at a typewriter. Scenes from the show play, depicting the 5 contestants with absurd situations, costumes, and reactions.
A bow tie floats in the air, framing a sun setting over the back of the house. Text appears. Snooker cue umbrella chin
Sophie laughs. Joanne gapes.
He produces a pair of white briefs.
A painting of a brown rodent, limbs wide, surrounded by red and green
A man eating a sandwich, staring forward blankly
Caption. First time in Nando's with my sister and I see the bloke of impractical jokers on bbc3. 2:35pm Nov 30 2012
Joanne stands. A balloon slowly deflates in her hand. We turn to see Che Guevara printed on the balloon.
She points to someone in the audience. Greg turns away, laughing
Greg smiles and nods
A photo of Greg and Alex at the beach, with their faces swapped disconcertingly.
Alex stands in front of the Taskmaster house, wearing a back support brace. It's a large, adjustable band that goes around the waist.
The task lies on a welcome mat. Alex rings the doorbell.
John drops the task on the ground
John smiles and walks away
John shrugs and runs away
Alex gives chase
Alex grabs John
The cart handle is too narrow
Items dangle from Joanne, including hoops, a racket, a traffic cone, and a drying rack
Sophie wears a life vest and stuffs it with objects
She dons a hoop skirt, and holds the ends up, creating a large pouch. Alex picks up a bucket of balls.
Joanne, covered in random items, smiles and waves. Sophie, holding a cart, a skirt full of balls, an umbrella, and a rubber ducky in a basket, also waves
Sophie's balls run away. A plate in Joanne's clothes crashes to the ground. She kicks the shards away.
Sophie nods
He wraps the tiger's paws around his neck and mimes a piggy back ride
Nick tries to balance a chair on his nose
Alex and Nick carry the cow
Steve emerges from the house. He wears a magician suit. Stacked above him is a tiger, a doll in a gold dress, and balloon headed cowboy magician.
The stack is taller than the door. Steve crouches.
He sits and shuffles
The stack leans forward, and the balloon head drops
Nick mounts the cow
The wind blows Steve's stack to the side, as he struggles to pick up the balloon head
Nick raises an umbrella
Steve holds the tiger's paws by his chin. He waves
Nick has an umbrella connected to a billiards cue. He balances the length on his chin. He waves, and the elongated umbrella falls. Part of our view is obscured by raindrops
John puts a chair over his shoulder, creating a shelf
John lays several yards of gutter across the chair.
He tapes small pictures and a scale model cutout of Greg to the gutter and chairs
John carries the gutter chair on his head, bearing 18 frames on gutters and a lifesize cutout in the chair. John spins around, knocking his gutter into the side of the house.
Piles of stuff
A raindrop looks like censorship
The stack is blown over
Gutter Greg
Nick smiles and clasps his hands together
Joanne 2
In the study, a hair dryer sits propped up in a coffee mug. It blows upwards at a hovering envelope. Our view reveals the thin string holding the envelope.
Steve waves his hand under the envelope
The envelope and string drop. Steve looks up and smiles
He puts a hand over the hairdryer, and mimes his hand flying away
Greg covers his mouth
The contestants stand.
Sophie and Joanne's feet clear the seats of the chairs. John and Steve are a little higher. Nick almost clears the back rest.
Nick wears a helmet and walks by towers of cans towards 5 tires
He puts a rubber band over his face
Joanne comes outside in a veil
She has a knife through her head
Sophie, wearing a top hat and a hoop skirt, jumps on a trampoline while pouring milk from a kettle. Alex, wearing a pigeon mask, holds out a glass.
Milk splatters his suit
Nick slides inside a row of tires. His head peaks out the right while his feet dangle out the left.
John gets on a stool
Nick starts to roll
He stops 3 feet shy of the cans
John jumps onto a mattress in front of Alex and a partially opened umbrella
Joanne, in a veil, eyepatch, and head knife, jumps onto a mattress
Sophie jumps, getting milk on Alex's pigeon head
Steve lies on a table in front of a sky backdrop
Nick rolls
He knocks over 1.6 stacks of cans.
Eyes covered, Nick lies inside the tire tube, having destroyed 1.1 towers of cans
Sophie, gaping, in mid air, wearing a hoop skirt, spraying milk over Alex in a suit and a pigeon head. They both face forward.
Steve wearing goggles and a messy wig looks down at us. He holds a handle connected to broken rope. Behind him is a cloudy sky backdrop.
Sophie gives thumbs up, dances, and high 5's Steve
In the lab, a camping cot sits under 3 rotating carousels of neck ties. The task is pinned to one of the ties.
Raised head
Raised chest
Several sticks with hook ends sit under the cot.
Alex mouths, They say that to everyone
John takes off his belt
Joanne lifts up her feet
She sits up
She rolls over and looks under the cot
She uses 2 hooks to grab a brown tie. John picks up 1 hook
She ties the brown tie around her thigh
They pull several ties down
She ties several to her thigh
John makes a long rope of ties, rolls onto his belly, and wraps the rope around the cot and himself
Joanne blindfolds herself
John gags himself and ties his wrists
He pulls untied ties off Joanne
John struggles to sit up
Joanne walks out with the cot tied to her back
She shuffles away
Sophie tosses rope into the lab, then army crawls back
She gets on the cot and grabs the rope
He has hooks and is tied up with ties. He begins to bounce the cot across the lab.
He tries to roll off, and the cot follows on top of him.
She tied up her stomach, and attached ties to her legs.
She smiles. Nick flails, unable to get out from under the cot.
He stands, wearing the cot on his back
Sophie pats Nick's knee
Steve slides to the floor, and tries to push the hooks into the bed. From the ground, he hits the ties with his hook. A red one falls in his lap.
Ties drop onto his chest
He holds the edge of the bed, covered in ties
Sophie makes a cutting motion
Nick 12, Joanne 10, Steve 9
A long board extends from the stage. At the end of the board is 4 squares with numbers, with 1 the closest and 4 the farthest.
It rolls slowly
Over bay 1
stopping in bay 2
She pushes a trolley. It stops in bay 3
He pushes a baby stroller. It stops a few inches shy of bay 1.
It moves to the left, and stops shy of Bay 1
He pushes gently. It stops where Nick and Joanne's did.
He pushes gently
The wheels stop next to Bay 1. John rubs his eyes with his fingers.
Bay 2
It barely moves.
Joanne is further than John.
Bay 2
It swings left
Left of Bay 3
Goes left
Passing John
Slowing as it reaches the edge
And falls off
Goes left
Ends just left of Bay 2
Greg fans himself
Steve picks up the car, John picks up the stroller. The 2 shake hands
John stops at Bay 2
The car stops just to the left of Bay 4. Greg throws his hands in the air as the car stops.
Steve licks one finger and puts it in the air. John rolls his eyes.
Steve and Sophie high five
John 20, Sophie 16, Nick 15, Steve 14, Joanne 12
A man eating a sandwich, staring forward blankly
John gestures to Sophie's painting, smiling. Sophie smiles.
John picks up his picture and waves it. Steve claps.
John blows up a red balloon. Joanne claps.
John holds up the face swapped Alex and Greg. Greg laughs, Alex looks around.
John wraps his arms around the pictures, and smiles and poses.
